title: 2 week ban why??
body: I haven't talked trash, I've been playing hard with a friend and finally managed to climb out of bronze then a day after a 2 week ban??? Why???? {{champion:254}}

replies.body: Nobody should ever be banned for saying things in chat. If people don't know how to mute, they deserve to be flamed.

So its ok to tell people to get cancer and kill themselves?

When you play the game there is some terms that you agree to.
Of course it's ok, the boarder should be at insighting violence, maybe throw in hate speech too. Sticks and stones may brake my bones but words can never hurt me.

That's the type of standards you set in the world. Personally I prefer that people are respectful of one another and treat each other with dignity.

I'm glad that the Riot Terms of Service share these ideals.
No shit, everyone prefers that people are respectful of one another but that doesn't give you the right to censor people or punish people for their verbalised opinions of others.

Given that Riot is the governing body of League of Legends, I'm pretty sure that *does* give them the right.

Just saying.
have you received prior punishments or is this a first time insta 2 week ban?

Hi! First of all congrats on climbing out of bronze! Anyway, posting things like this in the boards won't really help, it would be better if you sent in a support ticket to riot to resolve this.

[Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us)
